meanings.sent1: The nonsaline water in the lake is safe for drinking.
meanings.sent2: The chef used nonsaline ingredients to prepare the soup.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally added nonsaline sugar to my coffee instead of salt!
meanings.sent4: Her nonsaline tears reflected her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The nonsaline soil made it difficult for plants to grow.

meanings.definition: Not related to or derived from salt.
meanings.sent1: The nonsaline rock formations in the cave were fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The nonsaline solution was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: He found a nonsaline way to season his food without salt.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsaline laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The nonsaline air in the desert was dry and refreshing.
